content: Welcome back, guys. Um, I'm not really too sure how to make this video. I thought I'd take the green screen down just to make it feel more kind of personal and real. Uh, but the title that you've read today is not clickbait at all. Yes, Squadbusters is ending development and the servers are going to be shutting down. So, straight up like Clash Mini, Everale, Heyday Pop, like any other Supercell game that you know they stop development, they kill the game. That's what's happening to Squadbusters. This isn't a joke. And I know this is a big thing just to announce out of nowhere. It's like like what class? But but it's real. So, I'm going to read the message that the developers are going to be sending to all of you guys uh as you're watching this video, and then I'm going to let you guys know about the mistakes I think they made, what they should have done, and then where do we go from here? Because, yeah, this is this is sad, guys. Anyways, so here it is. Uh this is the message that you'll see in game if you log on. Uh but I'll read it out. Squad busters development is ending. final update in December 2025. We launched Squadbusters in May of 2024, and we're delighted that millions of you jumped in right from the start. The excitement around the launch and the positive response made us believe the game had potential to stand alongside our biggest hits. At Supercell, we celebrate what we learned from our failures, and Squadbusters was an opportunity to apply some of those lessons, especially from previous games with long beta periods. We wanted to move faster, take bold risks, and learn directly from a global audience instead of waiting years in a limited release. What we learned was that we got it wrong. The game did not meet the high expectations that both you, our players, and we as Supercell have for our games. And by early 2025, we face a true crossroad. Either accept that Squad Busters might never grow into the kind of global phenomenon phenomenon uh that we dreamed of or take a big creative swing. We chose the latter. The introduction of Heroes was the boldest game change off the scale in Supercell's live game history. An attempt to redefine what Squadbusters could be. But despite the team's best efforts and your continued support, we were not able to find a lasting solution to its core problems. After months of reflection, we have made the extremely difficult decision to end active development of Squadbusters. There will be one final update in December of 2025, which will include part of the content we shared in our recent road map. After that, the game will remain available to download and play for a while longer. Although, we do expect to close it at some point in 2026, but not before the middle of the year. While this is not the outcome we hoped for, we believe it is the right decision to stay true to Supercell's goal of creating games that players can love for years. Squad Basters brought joy to many of us, but it did not reach the long-term quality bar we hold ourselves to. Making games that millions play and remember forever. The Squad team is made up of supremely talented developers. And by shifting the energy to both new games and our existing live games, we can continue improving the experience millions of players already love and ensure that every future Supercell game has the best possible chance to thrive. So, what's going to be happening now, guys? Well, inapp purchases are no longer going to be available from the time that you're watching this video. Uh, if you've made any purchases during 2025 at all, you'll be able to request a transfer of their value to another Supercell game, including Clash Royale, Brawl Stars, Clash of Clans, Heyday, or Boom Beach. The transfer window opens on November the 10th through player support, and will remain available until the end of 2025. To claim your transfer, be ready to provide the game name, your player name, and player tag from the game you want to transfer to. And then follow these steps. Open settings in Squadbusters. Tap more settings. Tap help and support. Tap the blue chat icon in the top right. Click leave a message button. Tap on transfer in-game currency and then follow the instructions. Additionally, as a thank you for your time, passion, and for being part of this project, you'll be able to claim free bundles through the Supercell Store for most of our other games. based on your total Squad busters play time. These bundles will be available starting November 10th and until the end of 2025. If you've never played Clash Royale, Brawl Stars, Clash of Clans, or Heyday, and you want to be allegible for the rewards, make sure to download the game and link your Supercell ID before November 10th. We're also bringing back the Squadbusters themed cosmetics that we that have remained exclusive since launch, giving you one last chance to claim them and take a piece of squad with you to Clash Royale, Brawl Stars, Clash of Clans, Haye, and Boom Beach. Now, we know this news brings questions and we want to address them openly. So, on November the 13th, we will we will share a written Q&A in game where we will dive deeper into this decision. You can submit your questions through this form and it's going to be a form linked to the post that you see if you log in game and we will do our best to include as many as possible. We're also exploring other ways to share the story of Squadbusters and its journey in the future. I this might be a bit of a Clash Mini in squad in Clash Royale scenario. I'm not sure. To everyone who played, supported, and believed in Squadbusters, thank you. Every meme, every squad, every chaotic match reminded us how lucky we have been to have such a passionate and creative community. We hope you continue your adventures in our other Supercell games and carry a piece of the squad spirit wherever you go. We are committed to learning from this experience and becoming better at what we do so that every future game we create has the best possible chance to be played for years and remembered forever. title: Squad Busters Is Shutting Down...
author: SirClaz
